mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.content, u.name, u.avatar, c.like_count, c.create_time, c.post_id, c.user_id, c.root_comment_id, c.reply_to_user_id, c.reply_to_user_name, c.child_count, c.reply_to_comment_id FROM know_pub.comment c LEFT JOIN know_pub.user u on c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} and c.is_root_comment = 1

SELECT c.id, c.content, u.name, u.avatar, c.like_count, c.create_time, c.post_id, c.user_id, c.root_comment_id, c.reply_to_user_id, c.reply_to_user_name, c.child_count, c.reply_to_comment_id FROM know_pub.comment c LEFT JOIN know_pub.user u on c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.root_comment_id = #{rootCommentId} AND c.is_root_comment = 0 ORDER BY c.like_count DESC, c.create_time DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT c.id, c.content, u.name, u.avatar, c.like_count, c.create_time, c.post_id, c.user_id, c.root_comment_id, c.reply_to_user_id, c.reply_to_user_name, c.child_count, c.reply_to_comment_id FROM know_pub.comment c LEFT JOIN know_pub.user u on c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.root_comment_id = #{rootCommentId} AND c.is_root_comment = 0
